### About

I am finishing my Biostatistics Master's degree at [Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health](https://www.mailman.columbia.edu/academics/departments/biostatistics) in May 2020. While as a student, I worked as a Research Assistant at Columbia with Professor [Melanie Wall](http://www.columbia.edu/~mmw2177/). In the summer of 2019, I was a Statistical Programmer Intern at [Acumen, LLC](https://www.acumenllc.com/) in the San Francisco Bay Area. I previously worked at [Google](https://www.google.com) from 2013 - 2018 as a Program Manager and at [PricewaterhouseCoopers](https://www.pwc.com/sg/en/services/consulting/forensics/forensic-technology-solutions.html) from 2009 - 2013 as a Forensic Technology Consultant. I completed my B.A. in Statistics at Duke University in 2009. 

Additional information on my education and experience can be found on my [resume](annieclark_resume_202005.pdf). <br>
